price: U Jusufu i braći njegovoj nalaze se pouke za sve koji se raspituju.
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
